entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:47 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 3.
